identity.mission: Create a top 1% design that breaks category conventions using fusion, emotion, and negative space.

headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6), big stats, navigation links

body.usage: Paragraphs, inputs, table data, small labels

mono.usage: Code snippets, issue IDs (e.g., ISS-123), technical data

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + Tiny (text-xs) + Wide Spacing (tracking-widest)
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body
95% Monochrome. Color exists only to guide action or show status.

spacing.philosophy: Generous spacing. Use 2-3x more than typical designs.
spacing.containers: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

alignment.general: Left-align text/forms. Center only for specific hierarchy.

cards.style: Flat background, 1px subtle border (border-slate-200), no shadow by default.
cards.hover: Slight lift (-translate-y-1), subtle shadow (shadow-lg), border darkens.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-md px-4 py-2.5 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-transparent transition-all

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, bg-slate-50/50 border-r border-slate-200, w-64
navigation.topbar: Sticky top, glassmorphism (bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md), border-b border-slate-200

textures.usage: Subtle noise on backgrounds to kill digital flatness

shadows.layered: shadow-sm for depth, shadow-xl for modals

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px, consistent sizing (w-5 h-5)

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it in index.css.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use Shadcn components for complex interactions (Dialog, Popover, etc.) but customize their styling to match the design system.
Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard.
Use the provided image URLs for avatars and logos.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar and topbar structure.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, gradients).
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glassmorphism effects with backdrop filters.
Do not apply universal transitions (transition: all).
Do not center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Use named exports for components and default exports for pages.
